text: Enjoy mountain views and cedar trees.Well maintained 3 bed, 2 bath home on a large sunny lot in Glenhaven Lakes. Main level features spacious living room, dining, kitchen, full bath and master. There are two bedrooms and a full bath on the main floor, nicely updated kitchen and great living with fireplace and dining rooms. The lower level is all a wonderful primary suite complete with an oversized full bath, walk in closet and your own private deck with views! The home has two garages!

Updated, one-level home in the Barkley/Alabama Hill neighborhood. Located on a quiet dead-end street, with close proximity to the Interurban Trail and just a 10-minute flat walk to Barkley Village. Perfect starter home or rental, 2 bedroom/1 bath cutie, includes many upgrades done by current seller such as: new roof, new heat pump for heating and cooling, new dishwasher, new gas fireplace, new carpet in the living room, new spacious composite deck that overlooks the greenbelt and is plumbed for gas bbq, it's close to Huckleberry park, has a sunny open floor plan, the potential for a daylight basement and carport, and is on the school and WTO buslines. Mid county, this spacious home has room for everyone & everything, even bring all the animals. The acreage is perfect for a horse or two, cow, goats you name it. Soak in the magic of Lummi Island in this wonderfully updated and well-located home just minutes from the ferry dock. text: Your chance 1 bed condominium at the Snowater resort, comes fully furnished. Located on the Nooksack River adjacent to the Mt. Baker Snoqualmie National Forest. Shy 80 acre farm with development potential in prime mid-county location. Overlooking the private, treelined lake sits the custom midcentury home, a 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath and 3, 894 sq ft with an attached garage, vaulted ceilings, picture windows, large deck and a two-story white stone fireplace. The entire property is fenced and cross-fenced for rotational grazing with a cattle guard entrance. Huge cattle barn with equipment parking, hay storage, feed bunkers, winter sacrifice pasture and loafing barn. Bull pasture with lean-to. The Yak barn is roughly 30' X 60' and would be perfect for horses with stalls and a roundpen. Currently the farm is a holistically managed grass-fed beef operation with a well-respected roadside farmstand.
